website_summaries.verdict: This versatile alarm clock is a good deal if you don't mind military time.
pros: A multifunctional alarm clock that also sports a speaker, lamp, and relaxing night-light with multiple colors
Has a small footprint that doesn't take up much space, and comes at an affordable price
cons: Clock is military time, which is confusing for consumers who don't understand it

customer_reviews.title: Would give it a better review if...
customer_reviews.text: It worked, at all. I bought this for my daughter and wondered why she wasn't using it. When I asked her, she said "Take it, try it" so I finally did and what a piece of junk. The charging outlet doesn't hold the cord so the slightest movement and it comes unplugged. It won't switch off anything but military time and not a single device in my house can hook up to it. All it keeps saying is searching for "blue tooth". It would be cool if it worked I think but I can't comment on the sound quality because I could never get it to hook up to anything. For now it is a just a waste of money...
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Hall

customer_reviews.title: So many features!
customer_reviews.text: This is primarily marketed as a Bluetooth nightlight but it has so many features. First it is a light, but it has many options. There are 3 levels of white but it also has a 7 color option which has 6 steady colors or a morphing. The Bluetooth is a nice quality for both music and phone. It has a clock and alarm feature. It also has an option to allow you to play a micro SD card. You can use headphones thru an Aux hole, but it also comes with aux cable for access. It can be portable and the charge lasted 10 hours for the light, shorter for music. Well worth the price, nice gift item.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. May

customer_reviews.title: What a great gift this is!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I got this little blue tooth speaker for my husband. Well, it ended up being his favorite gift. This little lamp has vivid colors that is perfect as a nightlight. It also has a clock and the speaker quality is awesome for its compact body. You can listen to music, play videos and talk to people on their phone, too. I highly recommend this bluetooth speaker to anyone looking for a good one.
customer_reviews.author: susan rodriquez

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker! Attractive, love the touch lighting with the warm White or multicolor options, and it fills the area with really nice sound! I also appreciate the longer than average battery life... my other speakers die within 2-3 hours of a full charge... this one lasts 4-5 times longer! Thanks Tranesca for another awesome, affordable product for your arsenal of goodies! Anyone reading this review- Don’t hesitate to buy this or anything from this company.... they have great customer service and products. In the event you get a fluke and something doesn’t work, they’ll handle it no questions asked! I really like them!
customer_reviews.author: Martin L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker for it's price point
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice speaker with the added bonus of being able to insert a micro SD card with music already on it. The sound quality is decent for its price point. I hooked it up to an Echo input and it works just like a regular Echo device with the added benefit of colored lights. The military time can be annoying at times but its not a game changer since most speakers don't even have a clock. All in all, I would buy another one like this if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful_User

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth speaker is very cool, it’s very simple to connect to your phone or iPod Bluetooth, it changes colors when you touch the speaker which is a neat feature. I was also surprised by the greeting you receive when you turn it in and the notification when it’s turning off, it’s battery life is long lasting, it’s sound quality is loud enough to be heard in my workplace. I definitely recommend to anyone trying to buy a Bluetooth speaker, would make a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love this little item!
customer_reviews.text: Wow--a really useful item that does a lot of different things. It has an alarm clock, lights of multiple colors and also different brightness levels. I've been using it as a night light and an alarm and I've also been playing music and streaming internet radio with my phone a couple of rooms away. It has a great compact footprint, but nice big sound that can be controlled from your phone (or other device) or the speaker itself. It comes with all the connectors needed and for me the charge lasts about 12 hours. Looks modern and sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: This is so cool.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp/speaker/clock is a great addition to our living room. The color choice and brightness is spot on. The controls are easy and intuitive. It is simple yet provides a brilliant combination of features. I highly recommend this for anyone who needs a speaker or a night light, or an accent light, or a mini clock for any room in the house. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: RF-Eng

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: There is a slight vibration in the sound, but they say that will go away with time. I wish it had more bass or at least an option to increase the bass, but overall it's a pretty good speaker. My wife loves the various color light modes. It's easy to connect and the volume can be controlled via the phone. It works especially well for listening to Church Sermon podcasts.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Star C

customer_reviews.title: good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this speaker. I don't use the lights a lot because it does run down the battery faster. I like that I can move it anywhere in my room to have the music playing. I wish you could use it when it was plugged in, though. When plugged in to charge, you do need to make sure that the connection is just so.....the plug in wiggles a bit and you have to make sure that it is charging. There is a light that comes on so you know that it is.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Y

customer_reviews.title: great speaker for the price with lots of functionality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker for the price. The lamp/colored light feature works great! It allows for bluetooth, AUX, and memory card connection for music and even has a clock. There is a hoot on the bottom that folds out so you can hang it upside down which is nice for camping trips! The sound quality is pretty nice for the price range if you're just looking for a simple portable speaker to have around and it has added functionality which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Bureau

customer_reviews.title: The sound is crisp and nice. Don't expect a lot of base
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised. The sound is crisp and nice. Don't expect a lot of base. Just a clear, decent sounding speaker. Their instructions are spot on. The more you use it the better it got. Took about 3 days to "break in". I really like the color changes and the hanger underneath. Not disappointed AT ALL! Cool speaker Tranesca!
customer_reviews.author: #9man

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a month if that
customer_reviews.text: Everything started off great. My daughter loved it. The alarm was terrific because it was actually loud enough to wake her up. Then a few weeks ago it would no longer stay turned on. Its always been connected to a power source but when she would go to turn on the light or set the alarm within a few seconds it would tell her "see you later" and shut off. I wasted more time than I care to admit trying to troubleshoot the silly thing. At this point I've sent an email since they claim to offer 12 months free replacement so maybe we can try again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth Speaker/Light
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It sounds great, Bluetooth works great, works via 3.5mm aux as well, and has a light with different color options or 3 different brightness levels of "regular" light. It can also play music from an SD card and can run on the battery. The only thing that could make it better was if the clock could do AM/PM.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great product and something I have been thinking of purchasing ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product and something I have been thinking of purchasing for a while. I want to play music to help me sleep at night and this is perfect for that, along with the soothing colors added bonus. This is a Speaker I can take with me when I travel. It also has an alarm clock, which is great. I love this new product from Tranesca. They’ve done it again!!
customer_reviews.author: anniez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a teen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 14 year old daughter who is very practical and almost impossible to shop for. She absolutely loves this and uses it all the time. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality for the price that I paid. I had anticipated something 'cheaper' feeling/looking but this was a great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful but is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this thing. Battery sucks does not last more than 15 min and I have charged it a full day, clock display is on 24 hours so my kids get all messed up, can not get programmed to wake up with Bluetooth or radio only one preset alar tone.
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: A hit with granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 12 year old granddaughter and she loves it. Biggest issue is deciding which color to display! If Tranesca's quality holds, she'll enjoy it and it's features for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C

customer_reviews.title: Never held a charge
customer_reviews.text: The only major thing happens to be a major thing - my device couldn't hold a charge. Moreover, I emailed the manufacturer as per the (decidedly endearing) instructions included in the box - I thought I'd at least try that route before offering a negative Amazon review. No response. Otherwise, things worked as I expected. The touch response to change the light was pretty good, and the sound quality was decent (not amazing, but I was never expecting amazing). In other words, I would've been happy with this device were it not for the charging difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality. It's a well produced piece. The sound quality is great between low and upper mid volume. Once it goes past 85% of max it becomes distorted. The changing night light is awesome. Color is vibrant and with the addition of being able to select the brightness gives it a nice touch. I recommend this product as a bed side piece. Either as a night light for kids or as a bedside light for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Is a very compact and nicely designed bluetooth speaker/clock. Looks very nice on a nightstand, the light changing ability makes it even better. The bluetooth works great. Compatibility with my phone and my husband phone were really easy to setup. I have a iphone 11 pro max and my husband has a Samsung note 10plus. They both work great. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a affordable bluetooth speaker/ night light/ clock. GREAT PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Santos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device at its price.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for over a week it. We used it mostly for night lamps. Works well, love the warm light. The speaker is also nice. Don't expect too much base from it though. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is due to it's material...it's a little on the cheap side. There were dark spots on my unit that I had to clean off upon receiving it. However, at the price, you cannot beat its functionalities.
customer_reviews.author: K_S2000

customer_reviews.title: Decent speaker
customer_reviews.text: I can't figure out how- if you can- to take it off military time. There weren't any instructions jn the box. The touch lamp is tricky to figure out but I think we got it. It puts out good sound and my 10 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for Bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth Speaker has lights that change colors. You can have various effects. The white night light has three brightness levels. It is portable. Supports a Micro SD/TF card, which is a great feature. Has a digital clock in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker. It has great sound quality and can be pretty loud for a bedroom. I use it mainly for the speaker, but my son likes the light while playing. The clock portion doesn’t matter. Only thing I wish it had was a plug adapter so I could have plugged it into my son’s bedroom wall. The USB cord isn’t long enough to sit on a night stand.
customer_reviews.author: HWatson

customer_reviews.title: Note: clock is only military time.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my teenager's room. Nice speaker and light for the price. The color-changing light is a hit. However, the clock is not ideal - the numbers are small and can only be programmed in military time.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with the speaker and rate it excellent based upon ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the Tranesca speaker a week ago and have used it with my iPhone in the evening while reading. I am satisfied with the speaker and rate it excellent based upon it price functions and sound. A good balance of these factors and sound is excellent for personal use and I use it at bed to fall asleep and to wake up. You
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Bright LEDs and SUPERB sound!
customer_reviews.text: Sound was surprisingly fantastic! The lighting is beautiful and well diffused, and even the clock isn't as bad as I thought it'd be. The sound blew me away by how loud it can be and also the LEDs are not visible so you cannot see any one led hanging out, it's all well diffused and gives it a nice look. Thought it's pretty annoying to setup, the instructions should be more than enough to help you change the time and set an alarm. In the photos the time looks messed up but that is just on camera. The time is fine but the camera picks things up the human eye can't.
customer_reviews.author: Chris chris

customer_reviews.title: Cute multi function bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable addition to my daughters bedroom. It took a little bit of playing around with the buttons to figure out the functions, but it works really well and the lights are very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Elkin

customer_reviews.title: Decent for Price
customer_reviews.text: This device works well for what it is designed to do at this price point. The light is much brighter than you would expect and the color changing works well. Do note, that the top can be sensitive to change (touch sensitive). However, it is easily changed back to whichever setting you prefer. The sound is adequate for this price point. It won't blow any minds but it is punchy. Substantially better clarity than a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Oh Dub

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love everything BUT for some reason, a few times, the light will change from normal lighting to red light? It has only happened twice and I’ve had it for a few months. Wonder if anyone’s done it too?
customer_reviews.author: Xoxojoy01

customer_reviews.title: Very cute.  Versatile.  Nice quality, good sound and great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as bedside alarm clocks. So many great choices on light colors and modes. Exceptional price and great sound. Love this!!! Planning on ordering one for each bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gates

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice light/Bluetooth speaker. I use it for my daughter’s room. Sometimes you have to touch it just the right way to get the right light you want, which can be annoying. The sound is good and it reaches pretty far. It doesn’t tell you how to change it from military time though.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Longoria

customer_reviews.title: BAD SOUND QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was extremely poor. Was so static-y it was worse than listening to bad vinyl. The lights were not very bright but I suppose as a nightlight it would be okay. We sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Music sound great.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for playing music to put my grand daughter to sleep... The sound is great and the light is perfect, because she does not like a dark room. I like that you can change the colors as some are more relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: Heart Felt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bluetooth users.
customer_reviews.text: This little item is so useful. I use it in my living room and in the bedroom. It's actually a lamp controlled by touch (or pat), so its perfect for half-awake mornings. It easily communicates with my bluetooth, and the sound is great for such a little tool. Great buy,
customer_reviews.author: AC123

customer_reviews.title: good sound, lights make it interesting
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth link worked easily and the different lights can create a soothing effect. Sound was very good and could easily be controlled from my iPod
customer_reviews.author: Howard A. Young

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Multi-functioning unit that we purchased for the added alarm feature for our son. The lights flash with music but don’t really seem to have any rhythm LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Speakers are great and the sound is clear. The different light effects are beautiful and the charge lasts 10 hours if your taking it on the go.Be for warned that the alarm is only in military time.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, light, design, and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The bluetooth range is greater than any device I currently use. Product quality is excellent. There were a few seconds of slight audio distortion on initial use, but this quickly disappeared as was explained in the instructions. Sound quality is quite good. The touch feature is very convenient, and setup is straightforward. I have come to really appreciate Tranesca product design and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, affordable bluetooth speaker. Of course other speakers like Bose Soundlink 2 have better sound quality. However, for this price (not spending over $100), I don't think there is any competition. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dong-Kyeong

customer_reviews.title: Can’t last battery charge
customer_reviews.text: The battery charge does not last long, the instructions are slightly complicated, and I would not use this to really hear your music it’s just to play your music. The light feature is cool but only when your battery last which is never
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I love listening to my rain or nature sounds as I go to sleep as well as having a soft glow about the room. The speaker night light is portable, USB charges and connects via blue tooth or aux cord.
customer_reviews.author: Shellgirl410

customer_reviews.title: Nice little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little speaker with pretty good sound. The lights are a fun addition. I use it at work for times when I don't want to use headphones.
customer_reviews.author: A. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker and lighting
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic purchase. I used it in my office and it is fantastic as a speaker. I also use it when I'm not working to just relax and medication. For the price the quality is well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great light with built in speaker
customer_reviews.text: The light is awesome. Has a great night light feature and lots of colors. The sound is decent and the clock is nice. So overall very pleased with the light/speaker.
customer_reviews.author: BSlaw

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave my son as a gift. Like the different functions, night light, radio, alarm clock and multiple colors are cool.
customer_reviews.author: BENJAMIN ANDREWS

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't operate it.
customer_reviews.text: Fustrating as I couldn't set up the alarm. Very confusing
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I think this is great for the money. Its not very loud but i dont need it to be so thats fine for me. My son loves the night light. Havent used alarm yet but seems to work great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Pricing
customer_reviews.text: This product for the price was not what I expected. It went beyond my expectations. Sound is great especially for the money! Love Tranesca toro ducts. When I look to purchase products I always look to see what they have first.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine Ayoub

customer_reviews.title: I really like the lights of the lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very fun color in the lamp, good sound but not as loud as I hoped, easy to connect with Bluetooth devices. The battery does not last much if using the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Compact,awesome sound. It actually sounds better than my iPad Air 2. Sensitive touch. Light goes from soothing white to bright reading light. Colors are nice too!
customer_reviews.author: C. bacot

customer_reviews.title: DISSAPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is not meet my expectations. First of all the battery die really fast. It does not last for a whole night. And the lights are not even as bright. Can’t even figure out how to set alarm clock. Just feel like I waisted my money. Want to return it but I have to pay for return shipping. Smhhhhh.
customer_reviews.author: Rabiat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. Cool colors. Great for dark rooms. The sound is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria P

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, and great customer service, the first one I received was malfunctioning and support made it easy to exchange, replacement came in and is working great
customer_reviews.author: ashkay

customer_reviews.title: Loud and sounds great! Love the lights!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is surprisingly loud and the color changing is simple after reading the instructions. Easy to use and quality built. I would definitely recommend! Even comes with charger and aux cord.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great night light for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: If you like to rock in the shower, this is a great choice. Nice nightlight as long as you don't accidentally bump the top as it will change your light color. Like the sound and convenience of Bluetooth to connect my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: No issues so far. Working great as a lamp with speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker for the money! At first I didn't know if I'd like it, but it does the job for listening to music and the colors are great! Even has an alarm clock, which isn't the reason I bought it! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Received this great little speaker, very happy with it. Super easy to set up. Favorite part is the light feature, lots of great colors to pick from. Great sound quality as well. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ToddM

customer_reviews.title: Only 24 hour clock
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter picked this out with her birthday money. Was very excited about it until we realized its. 24 hour clock and cannot be changed. Totally bummed kid. We are returning and I will verify the new one has a 13 hour clock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound and lights are great
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this. The time is in 24 hour format. The lights and sound are great
customer_reviews.author: Paula D

customer_reviews.title: My daughters are very happy
customer_reviews.text: My girls are very happy with this night light/ portable speaker. it is very user friendly and my one daughter cannot let it go. She has been walking around with it all day, and it is now keeping her company at night as she is scared of the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Chanakya

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Speaker was good and pretty for about a month, then suddenly didn’t work anymore. Wasn’t dropped or mistreated at all. Don’t buy if you need a long lasting nightlight/speaker.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Nifty product!
customer_reviews.text: Like the compactness of it as well as the colors it changes to while playing. Has a nifty little handle on the bottom too. Great product, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SC Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, works like a charm. Easy to plug in and connect the phone. Good enough to use as a speaker on its own. Might purchase another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: it super cute and easy to use. I'm buying more for Christmas gifts perfect
customer_reviews.author: tucker

customer_reviews.title: Love This Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this portable speaker and everything about it from the cool light effects and the sound is awesome. The only thing, I expected the battery life to be A1. Its ok but good be better. Just really have to stay on top of recharging it when not utilizing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tionna B.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Disco light mode is cool! Good sound. Like the click feature.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Neat product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bedside night light. I can listen to music then just till b over and touch it to turn off the light.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Does not charge
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this item until I discovered how difficult it is to charge. You have to fight with the cable and pray it'll work which it rarely does. Who wants to go through that for something that should be so simple? If only it charged and I were able to use it more than the few times I could get it to work, I would have really enjoyed this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee Larson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. its awesome!! Great Company to buy products from.
customer_reviews.author: Meridith Preston

customer_reviews.title: Sound and sight.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old granddaughter loved the fact that it was a night light as well as a speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great and the led light is such a great feature, i often use it as a night lamp
customer_reviews.author: Zachary C.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to charge
customer_reviews.text: Charger included with product does not charge. & product is difficult to charge period with any charger, as cords just fall out unless you adjust/play around with cord and speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction met
customer_reviews.text: It can reach louder than I expected a speaker this size could be...handy little speaker nice for trips an stuff offers nice soft light... great for chilling an having a little music
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Calderon

customer_reviews.title: A very big sound for a small device
customer_reviews.text: The Night Light Bluetooth Speaker sounds great. Like both the compact size and various night light features.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful company and Products
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the alarm feature. This company is wonderful to deal with and have great products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and practical ... love the changing colors and the speakers pretty good. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dales J.

customer_reviews.title: What a great little product for $20
customer_reviews.text: What a great little product for $20. A solid sound for a small bluetooth speaker with the advantage of a clock and night light. Hard to beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: MGM

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with my perches
customer_reviews.text: Light is not working well at times can't turn off and it after turning it off it comes on by it self very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is great. The lights are great. The alarm sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Rivett

customer_reviews.title: Essence of Europhon design Radio lamp  of the 70's
customer_reviews.text: Nice bluetooth speakers. The lights are what really make it stand out with essence of Europhon design Radio lamp of the 70's.
customer_reviews.author: DMS

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Long battery life, alarm works well, good sound, and great portability.
customer_reviews.author: Kamal Vij

customer_reviews.title: Night light
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old loves it. It lights up her room every night.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Champagne

customer_reviews.title: Bright and sound is good
customer_reviews.text: A cool little light that works perfect for my daughter as a nightlight and music from her chrome book.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: only military time
customer_reviews.text: its only military time. Other then that it looks like a nice night light.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Great BT speaker
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Nice speaker and like the colors. Adorable too. Like the white.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very cool lamp, my kids love it. Only one thing that I don't like is that the time is operated on military time.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Great small company with amazing products
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 13 daughter and she LOVES IT! Great small company customer care & service... will buy products by this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Not bad little speaker/alarm clock

product_meta.title: Night Light Bluetooth Speaker, Tranesca Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker with 7 Color LED Light, Warm Night Light and Alarm
feature_bullets: Everything in a set: Versatile and Multi-Functional. This devices works as a bluetooth speaker, table clock, alarm clock, wireless portable speaker; desk lamp, multi-color night light and baby light; Buy one and get all.
Warm Lights on a cold night: 3 levels of warm light mode and 7 colored light mode plus alarm clock function makes the product a perfect bedside lamp
Easy to use: Easy to switch between different modes (Bluetooth, LED light, Alarm clock etc) together with Detailed Instruction Guide makes the product an absolutely no brainer

Compact and Portable: Bluetooth protocol enables a maximum connect distance of 35 ft; Also comes with a built-in ion battery that can support music playing up to 4.5 hours thus making it a perfect companion outdoors
Note: THIS SPEAKER DISPLAYS MILITARY TIME ONLY. 12 month hassle free return policy from Tranesca
